author: Mohammed Haddad
title: Coronavirus: How much of the world is staying at home?
description: Billions of people around the world have been ordered to stay at home to help curb the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Governments around the world have ordered citizens to stay at home and practice physical distancing to help curb the coronavirus pandemic.
In an attempt to contextualise how people's movements have been affected, tech giant Google recently released its COVID… [+3362 chars]
